publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1538 Richard Baker: Byron Square Shop Shutters Regeneration Project-That the Parliament commends the Byron Square Shop Shutters Regeneration Project in Aberdeen; congratulates the young people involved for the excellent and innovative artwork on the shutters; notes the invaluable contribution of those responsible for running the project in making it a success, and further notes the importance of projects such as this that involve young people more fully in their communities.

S2M-1538 Richard Baker: Byron Square Shop Shutters Regeneration Project-That the Parliament commends the Byron Square Shop Shutters Regeneration Project in Aberdeen; congratulates the young people involved for the excellent and innovative artwork on the shutters; notes the invaluable contribution of those responsible for running the project in making it a success, and further notes the importance of projects such as this that involve young people more fully in their communities. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-1538 Byron Square Shop Shutters Regeneration Project (lodged on 24 June 2004) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-1538 Byron Square Shop Shutters Regeneration Project (lodged on 24 June 2004) Helen Eadie*
S2M-1538 Byron Square Shop Shutters Regeneration Project (lodged on 24 June 2004) Mr David Davidson*
S2M-1538 Byron Square Shop Shutters Regeneration Project (lodged on 24 June 2004) Brian Adam*
